data.name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Red Dark Weapon Skin Set
data.detailed_description:
Hunt the unwary in style with the Red Dark Weapon Skin Set.
These skins can be equipped in the Loadout menu on both Insurgent and Security teams where available:
- Pistol - M9
- Assault Rifle - AS Val
- Shotgun - TOZ-194
- Assault Rifle - AKM
- Battle Rifle - FAL
- Sniper Rifle - SVD

These items are unlocked in-game immediately upon purchase. They can be equipped in-game in the Loadout menu under each weapon’s “Aesthetic” upgrade category.
data.about_the_game:
Hunt the unwary in style with the Red Dark Weapon Skin Set.
These skins can be equipped in the Loadout menu on both Insurgent and Security teams where available:

These items are unlocked in-game immediately upon purchase. They can be equipped in-game in the Loadout menu under each weapon’s “Aesthetic” upgrade category.
data.short_description: Hunt the unwary in style with the Red Dark Weapon Skin Set for six Insurgent weapons.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Danish, Finnish, Hungarian, Japanese, Norwegian, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Swedish, Czech, Thai, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 (3.10GHz)/AMD FX-6300 (3.50GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760/AMD Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 (3.20GHz)/AMD Ryzen 7 2700 (3.20GHz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980/AMD Radeon R9 390X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD is recommended.
